name: DGG Link Clicker
description:
Press CTRL + Click within destiny.gg or Twitch chat to click the (first) closest link within the message.  Boring details: 
 * Prioritises older messages. 
 * Opens links in a new tab without interrupting the stream. 
 * DGG #embeds have their own case to work as normal. 
 * Twitch is supported but much less tested so bugs may crop up. 
 Probably not putting much more work into this. 
 
 GH: https://github.com/AlfieSimpson/LinkClicker
